Name: Arcade LA Deadzone
About the game: The west coast has fallen. An army of undead roam the streets. Your only chance of survival is to retaliate. Not everyone will make it out alive. Arcade LA Deadzone is a virtual reality cooperative fight through the streets of Los Angeles. Built specifically for VR Arcades, up to four players can share a space utilizing backpack PCs, becoming completely wireless. Optionally, the game can also be played where each player has their own section of the map if a backpack PC setup is not available. Featuring a quick setup technology, Arcade owners can input their own unique identifier code, so that players can jump right into the game without delay. - Full voice chat support - Four players - Spectator support (Inject an outside perspective using a non-VR computer so onlookers can enjoy seeing what's happening inside the game) - Backpack PC and non-backpack PC setup - Full Arcade Support Please consult instructions for setup in the external links section of the store page, under user manual.
